message.content:
cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.DM. 

The paper deals with the problem of locally correcting Boolean functions, which is a topic in computational complexity theory (cs.CC) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The use of measure of symmetric influence suggests that information theory (cs.IT) may also be relevant. The paper also discusses the local correction of juntas and partially symmetric functions, which are topics in machine learning and statistics (cs.LG) and discrete mathematics (cs.DM), respectively.
